description: RoadTripBingo take the classic game of Bingo & make it playable while driving in the car. Kids will have a blast looking for the various items and trying to get a Bingo before you arrive at your destination. The idea of the game is to spot different types of items that can be seen while driving. Once you see one of the items on your Bingo card, place a marker by touching the correct item. Press and hold on an item and the game will say the item aloud to help with young readers. Your kids can play by themselves or as a team. If they get stuck, they can just restart the game by shaking the phone for a new Bingo card. RoadTripBingo Features: • Hundreds of fun items to search for • Thousands of unique Bingo cards • Intuitive clean interface • Auto save game progress So, if you’re looking to keep the kids busy while driving, you must have them play RoadTripBingo!
